statements: DELETE FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_id = 100 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND ethnicity = 'Hispanic';
DELETE FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND age > 50
DELETE FROM healthcare_services WHERE service_id = 2005 AND service_category = 'Surgery'
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 60 AND race = 'Black' OR ethnicity = 'Hispanic';
DELETE FROM service_usage WHERE patient_id = 100 AND service_id = 200;
DELETE FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE facility_id IN (SELECT facility_id FROM services_available WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01');
